# Sky Dolly
Sky Dolly - The Black Sheep for Your Flight Recordings.
translatedContent: Sky Dolly - 당신의 비행 녹화를 위한 검은 양.

originContent: ## About
Sky Dolly connects to a running Flight Simulator 2020 instance and records various simulation variables, for replay.
translatedContent: Sky Dolly는 실행 중인 Flight Simulator 2020 인스턴스에 연결하여 다양한 시뮬레이션 변수를 녹화하고 재생합니다.

originContent: ![Sky Dolly v0.11.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/./img/SkyDolly-v0.11.0.png)
The connection is made via SimConnect, a standard API introduced with Flight Simulator X to connect with the flight simulator.
translatedContent: 연결은 Flight Simulator X와 함께 도입된 표준 API인 SimConnect를 통해 이루어집니다.

originContent: Aso refer to the [ABOUT.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/ABOUT.MD).
## Features
- Record / Pause / Play
- Formation flights (multiple aircraft, replay during recording, "fly with formation", time offset)
translatedContent: - 편대 비행 (여러 항공기, 녹화 중 재생, "편대 비행", 시간 오프셋)

originContent: - Settable recording sample rate: fixed or variable ("auto")
translatedContent: - 설정 가능한 녹화 샘플 속도: 고정 또는 가변("자동")

originContent: - Adjustable replay speed ("slow motion", "timelapse"), replay loop
translatedContent: - 조정 가능한 재생 속도 ("슬로우 모션", "타임랩스"), 재생 반복

originContent: - Position, velocity and basic flight control simulation variables (ailerons, rudder, flaps, gears, ...) are recorded
translatedContent: - 위치, 속도 및 기본 비행 제어 시뮬레이션 변수 (에일러론, 러더, 플랩, 기어 등) 녹화

originContent: - Plugin architecture with various import/export plugins (CSV, GPX, IGC, KML)
translatedContent: - 다양한 가져오기/내보내기 플러그인이 있는 플러그인 아키텍처 (CSV, GPX, IGC, KML)

originContent: - Location module with over 100 default locations and import/export functionality
translatedContent: - 100개 이상의 기본 위치와 가져오기/내보내기 기능을 갖춘 위치 모듈

originContent: - Database (SQLite) based persistence ("logbook")
Watch the (preview) release trailer on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I):

[![Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)](https://img.youtube.com/vi/_n4qRtm78_I/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I "Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)")
translatedContent: [![Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)](https://img.youtube.com/vi/_n4qRtm78_I/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I "Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)")

originContent: For more videos created with Sky Dolly also refer to [SHOWCASE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHOWCASE.md). New and upcoming features are found in the [CHANGELOG](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/CHANGELOG.md).
translatedContent: Sky Dolly로 제작된 더 많은 영상은 [SHOWCASE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHOWCASE.md)를 참고하세요. 새롭고 다가오는 기능은 [CHANGELOG](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/CHANGELOG.md)에서 확인할 수 있습니다.

originContent: ## Basic Usage
- Start a flight
- Click on "Record" (key R)
- You may pause recording (key P)
- Stop recording (key R) and click on "Play" (spacebar)
- Adjust the replay speed and seek the play position, also during replay
translatedContent: - 재생 속도를 조절하고 재생 위치를 탐색할 수 있으며, 재생 중에도 가능합니다

originContent: - Recorded flights are automatically persisted in the "logbook"
- Select a flight in the logbook and press "Load" (or double-click the row) to load the persisted flight
translatedContent: - 로그북에서 비행을 선택하고 "불러오기"를 누르거나 행을 더블클릭하여 저장된 비행을 불러옵니다

originContent: ### Formation Recording & Replay
#### Recording
- Switch to the "Formation" module (key F2)
- Click on "Record" (key R)
- Each recorded aircraft is added to the current flight
translatedContent: - 녹화된 각 항공기가 현재 비행에 추가됩니다

originContent: - While existing aircraft are replayed during the recording with "auto" sample rate you may still change the recording sample rate
translatedContent: - 기존 항공기는 "자동" 샘플링 속도로 재생되며 녹화 중에도 샘플링 속도를 변경할 수 있습니다

originContent: #### Position
- The last recorded aircraft becomes the "user aircraft" (being followed by the camera in the flight simulator)
translatedContent: - 마지막으로 녹화된 항공기가 "사용자 항공기"가 됩니다 (비행 시뮬레이터에서 카메라가 따라가는 대상)

originContent: - Select a position relative to the current "user aircraft" before recording
translatedContent: - 녹화 전에 현재 "사용자 항공기"에 상대적인 위치를 선택합니다

originContent: #### Replay
- Simply click on "Play", "Pause" and seek in the timeline, just like with a single aircraft flight
translatedContent: - 단일 항공기 비행과 마찬가지로 "재생", "일시정지"를 클릭하고 타임라인에서 탐색할 수 있습니다

originContent: - Change the "user aircraft" (also during replay) to "jump from cockpit to cockpit"
translatedContent: - "사용자 항공기"를 변경할 수 있으며 (재생 중에도) "조종석에서 조종석으로 점프"할 수 있습니다

originContent: - Take control of the "user aircraft" by selecting either "Take control" or "Fly with Formation" option
translatedContent: - "사용자 항공기"를 제어하려면 "제어권 획득" 또는 "편대와 함께 비행" 옵션을 선택합니다

originContent: #### Managing Formations
- You may delete single aircraft from a flight ("formation")
translatedContent: - 비행("편대")에서 단일 항공기를 삭제할 수 있습니다

originContent: - There must be at least one aircraft per flight, so the last aircraft cannot be deleted
translatedContent: - 비행당 최소 한 대의 항공기가 있어야 하므로 마지막 항공기는 삭제할 수 없습니다

originContent: - Add a time offset to the selected aircraft ("multiplayer formation flight synchronisation")
translatedContent: - 선택한 항공기에 시간 오프셋을 추가할 수 있습니다 ("멀티플레이어 편대 비행 동기화")

originContent: - To start a new, single-aircraft flight change back to the "Logbook" module (key F1) and click on "Record" (key R)
translatedContent: - 새 단일 항공기 비행을 시작하려면 "로그북" 모듈로 돌아가 (키 F1) "녹화"를 클릭합니다 (키 R)

originContent: Why don't you try it with one of the guided ["Tell Tours"](https://github.com/till213/Tell-Tours)? :)
translatedContent: 가이드가 있는 ["텔 투어"](https://github.com/till213/Tell-Tours) 중 하나로 시도해 보시겠어요? :)

originContent: ## Download
Go to [Releases](https://github.com/till213/SkyDolly/releases) and download the latest release.
Latest (pre-)release: **Sky Dolly 0.19.2**
Compute and compare your checksum against the [published SHA-256 checksums](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHASUM256.md), to verify the integrity of your downloaded copy.
translatedContent: 다운로드한 복사본의 무결성을 확인하려면 [공개된 SHA-256 체크섬](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHASUM256.md)과 계산한 체크섬을 비교하세요.

originContent: ## Build
Refer to the [BUILD](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/BUILD.md) documentation.
## Related Projects
- https://github.com/nguyenquyhy/Flight-Recorder - A .Net based flight recording & replay application
translatedContent: - https://github.com/nguyenquyhy/Flight-Recorder - .Net 기반의 비행 기록 및 재생 애플리케이션

originContent: - https://github.com/saltysimulations/saltyreplay/ - A recording & replay with a web user interface
translatedContent: - https://github.com/saltysimulations/saltyreplay/ - 웹 사용자 인터페이스를 갖춘 기록 및 재생

originContent: - https://github.com/SAHorowitz/MSFS2020-PilotPathRecorder - Records the flight and generates Google Earth (KML format) "replays"
translatedContent: - https://github.com/SAHorowitz/MSFS2020-PilotPathRecorder - 비행을 기록하고 Google Earth(KML 형식) "재생"을 생성

originContent: - https://github.com/Elephant42/FS_Tool - A simple tool that allows to set the aircraft location and simulation rate
translatedContent: - https://github.com/Elephant42/FS_Tool - 항공기 위치 및 시뮬레이션 속도를 설정할 수 있는 간단한 도구

originContent: - https://github.com/pyviator/msfs-geoshot - Takes screenshots and automatically "geotags" them
- https://github.com/ijl20/msfs_logger_replay - IGC logger and replay (for FSX)

- https://joinfs.net/ - Allows to synchronise multiplayer flights across different flight simulators (MSFS, Prepar3D/FSX, XPlane). Also provides a flight recorder with formation flight recording ("overdub").
translatedContent: - https://joinfs.net/ - 서로 다른 비행 시뮬레이터(MSFS, Prepar3D/FSX, XPlane) 간 멀티플레이어 비행 동기화 지원. 편대 비행 기록("오버더브") 기능이 포함된 비행 기록기도 제공.

originContent: - https://github.com/paulalexandrow/a32nx-webremote - WebRemote for FlyByWire's A32NX: control cockpit functionality of the FBW A320, using FSUIPC7
translatedContent: - https://github.com/paulalexandrow/a32nx-webremote - FlyByWire의 A32NX용 WebRemote: FSUIPC7을 사용하여 FBW A320 조종석 기능 제어

originContent: - https://flightloganalyzer.com/ - FlightLog Analyer analyses the MSFS logbook and has a CSV export readable by Sky Dolly
translatedContent: - https://flightloganalyzer.com/ - FlightLog Analyzer는 MSFS 로그북을 분석하며 Sky Dolly에서 읽을 수 있는 CSV 내보내기 기능 제공

originContent: - https://github.com/BojoteX/FSAutoSave/ - FSAutoSave automatically (or upon request) stores flight plans
translatedContent: - https://github.com/BojoteX/FSAutoSave/ - FSAutoSave는 비행 계획을 자동 또는 요청 시 저장

originContent: - https://github.com/mracko/MSFS-Landing-Inspector - Analyses your landing performance

- [Points of Interest (Google Maps)](https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1KUg5jwyT_9k2A9n5IZ99UChlhfVUfO5S&ll=-3.81666561775622e-14%2C-23.028915134521867&z=1) - Points of Interest, Airports and 3D cities in Microsoft Flight Simulator.
translatedContent: - [관심 지점(Google Maps)](https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1KUg5jwyT_9k2A9n5IZ99UChlhfVUfO5S&ll=-3.81666561775622e-14%2C-23.028915134521867&z=1) - Microsoft Flight Simulator 내 관심 지점, 공항 및 3D 도시

originContent: ## Other Useful Resources
- https://obsproject.com/ - Screen capture / broadcast application
- https://sqlitebrowser.org/ - Browse the Sky Dolly logbook (*.sdlog) database files, execute your own SQL queries
translatedContent: - https://sqlitebrowser.org/ - Sky Dolly 로그북 (*.sdlog) 데이터베이스 파일을 탐색하고 직접 SQL 쿼리 실행
